description: Welcome to UPTOWN, where style meets comfort in this BEAUTIFULLY UPDATED 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom townhome spanning nearly 1700sqft. Designed to impress, it feels like a SHOWHOME. Thoughtful upgrades include fresh paint, elegant light fixtures, granite counters, tile backsplash, wide plank vinyl flooring, new carpets, ALL-NEW SS appliances, refinished cabinets with modern hardware, custom millwork, new blinds, screens throughout, and concrete pavers in the private, fully fenced yard backing onto PERMANENT GREEN SPACE. Enjoy amenities including a clubhouse, gym, guest suite, and playground. Ideally located near parks, schools, shopping, transit, and commuting routes, with low strata fees.
